name: Bones n' Indy
description:
Welcome to Bones n' Indy...

You are an archaeologist tasked with recovering lost artifacts.

Your companion dog has an excellent nose for history. Pay attention to him.

If you find anything, be sure to return it to the museum.

Watch out for bandits, they will rob you if you are not careful.

Press M to toggle your artifact list.

Switch between controlling you and your dog with the Right Mouse Button.

Move player or dog with WASD.

Click anywhere on the map to dig for artifacts or to bark.

This game uses the Kenney 1-Bit Art Pack!

 https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

and was made for the "MizJam"
